        PagedList<EmailSearchReport> search(Sender sender,

                                    Date sentBefore,
                                    Integer start,
                                    Integer limit)
        Search emails.
        Parameters:
        sender - Sender
        recipient - Recipient address
        sentSince - Date since the email was sent
        sentBefore - Date before the email was sent
        start - Start index for pagination
        limit - Limit results for pagination
        Returns:
        Search result
